channel.title: A Big Change. A Little Hiccup
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
You may notice ___an absence of subcategories.___ We (Staff) decided that subcategories weren't really helping.
The change has accidentally necrobumped a few posts. Sorry about that.
If you see a subcategory remaining, don't feed it; don't try to reason with it; just let us know if we missed any.
Thanks, Staff

item.title: A Big Change. A Little Hiccup

Hi everyone,

You may notice an absence of subcategories. We (Staff) decided that subcategories weren’t really helping.

The change has accidentally necrobumped a few posts. Sorry about that.

If you see a subcategory remaining, don’t feed it; don’t try to reason with it; just let us know if we missed any.
